column17: E L James offers a fresh perspective on the love story that has enthralled millions of readers around the world.Christian Grey exercises control in all things; his world is neat
column19: and utterly empty—until the day that Anastasia Steele falls into his office
column20: in a tangle of shapely limbs and tumbling brown hair.\xa0He tries to forget her
column21: but instead is swept up in a storm of emotion he cannot comprehend and cannot resist.\xa0Unlike any woman he has known before
column23: unworldly Ana seems to see right through him—past the business prodigy and the penthouse lifestyle to Christian’s cold
column24: \xa0wounded heart.\xa0\xa0Will being with Ana dispel the horrors of his childhood that haunt Christian every night? Or will his dark sexual desires
column26: and the self-loathing that fills his soul drive this girl away and destroy the fragile hope she offers him?This book is intended for mature audiences. ...more"
